author: Staff Reporter
text:
Thoothukudi Second Additional Sessions Court Judge T. Jeyarajan on Friday sentenced two persons accused in a murder case to undergo life imprisonment.

According to prosecution, S. Sridhar (34) of Sivan Kovil Street in Kongarayakurichi and A. Mohammed Ibrahim (24) of the same locality were found guilty of murdering M. Sheik Abdul Kadar (60) of Kongarayakurichi on February 9, 2014, in a reprisal attack.

Srivaikuntam police had filed a case following the incident. The accused were punished under Section 302 of the Indian Penal Code. The judge also imposed a fine of Rs. 1,000 on each of them.
title: Two get life term in murder case
